--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Nightstrike::
> 
> "Yes, milord and what about that bot named Blindfear"said the male
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > Megatron turned to Nightstrike, the arial attacker had woken him 
> from
> > his thoughts. "Join the rest of us in the Dark Avian, it is time 
> for us
> > to move." he gloated, as he headed into it.

::DOMNIJOE AND BLINDCHAOS::

    Domnijoe began moving off toward the Dark Avian at this point, 
quietly digesting the death of Slaughter over and over in her head. 
She didn't much care for Organics, but she didn't exactly HATE them 
either. She was certain they had a use....she was certain Megatron 
would use them if he could earn some personal gain from them.
    Next to her walked Blindchaos, who looked positively sick. He 
hadn't taken Slaughter'd death kindly, and in not the fashion she had 
presumed.
    "Organics make such a disgusting mess." he complained.
    Domnijoe stared at the robots moving ahead of her.
    "This from the guy who's seen the Transformer physiology both 
inside and out and actively ENJOYS taking it to pieces."
    Blindchaos pouted, the expression very innocent and child-like.
    "Yeah...but organics are different." he  sputtered. "Transformers 
don't go "sshhhuiirp-crunch" when you squish 'em"
    Domnijoe could only snort as she walked faster, eager to see he 
new home and desperate to get away from Blindchaos' annoying manner.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
